plot: A cavalcade of characters come together to celebrate comedians throughout pop culture in the opening reception for the 2nd-annual "Is This Thing On" art show at Gallery 1988 with special focus on artists' take on "Weird Al" Yankovic.
title: Is This Thing on 2? The Weird Year
plot_es: A cavalcade of characters come together to celebrate comedians throughout pop culture in the opening reception for the 2nd-annual "Is This Thing On" art show at Gallery 1988 with special focus on artists' take on "Weird Al" Yankovic.
original_name: Is This Thing on 2? The Weird Year
plot_en: A cavalcade of characters come together to celebrate comedians throughout pop culture in the opening reception for the 2nd-annual "Is This Thing On" art show at Gallery 1988 with special focus on artists' take on "Weird Al" Yankovic.
